attributes.action: Immediatley expel the Sudans ambasador from the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With referrence to the arrest and imprisonment of Gillian Gibbons we would like the UK government to take swift and immediate retribution!

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
